post.body: buy yourself something nice. You definitely deserve it!
just said "did you practice with your box last night?" hee, hee!
I nominate @zappos for a Shorty Award in #brand. I think everyone else should too! ;o)
why are you always crying? :o)
Trying to see Santa at town square today. Still can't believe he didn't show at the district cuz of the wind!
they cancelled santa today because of the wind. seriously?
Good to see old pals @ukneill and @scottalk! Miss you guys!
Everytime I turn on the holiday music station I hear wham! I wonder if Rick astley has any holiday songs?
The waiting is the hardest part! I hate going to the doctor!
Those darn immersion questions are making my head spin! Wish I would have answered a few differently
Smiles! Great day for feeling a bit under the weather!
Yes! The puzzle pieces of life are finally being put back together!
Just drove by my old house! They painted the front door red and killed my honeysuckle bushes!
On my way to phoenix!
Wish I may, wish I might...I'm wishing on the second shooting star I've seen tonight!
taking comfort in listening to tuesday's gone...
Ha! Now facebook friends with the guy I once thought I would marry!
laughing at the crazy people i work with at zappos! xo, xo!
i love when zappos sparks a conversation! http://idek.net/aI
great to talk to you @phoenixsunsgirl! have a great day!
igoogle's reason to drink: Mix yourself one last hurricane, as it's the official end of the hurricane season!
Food, family, friends, and bowling! Lots to be thankful for!
Woke up to the sound of pouring rain...
looking for ideas for email-specific creative briefs. if anyone has one that they'd be willing to share, please DM me!
Nothing like waiting until the last minute! Thankfully I can still order from zappos and get it to Wyoming on time!
Making gingerbread inspired structures with zappos marketing team!
Boarding @southwest to get back to Vegas. Hope all of the crew is here!
Please let my @southwest flight make it in to Vegas this morning!
I love that Vegas snow made the intro for the today show!
My head is hitting a sea of pillows. Goodnight moon...
This is crazy but I actually saw the zappos commercial "live" for the first time just a few seconds ago. Unexpected and I love it!
how many times have i heard "roll camera. action!" today?
lights! camera! action! "don't fear the box."
on set for the big production!
I wish someone would have told me 5 years ago that it really DOES matter where you get your mba from!
4 am is waaaaaay too early to get up. Girl at coffee bean made the wrong drink. Grrr!
havin' a drink...watching the numbers roll in! ha!
ugg sample sale today at zappos! can't wait!
needing a hookup for disneyworld passes. can't believe how expensive they are!
read that on avg day, women reach for electronic devices 9x (3x more often) than they reach out to their partner for affection. so very sad!
reading a great book on PR and social media! i love this line-"participation is the new marketing." i guess we never really stop marketing!
I bought an iphone. What is the best twitter app?
Happy new year! So happy that 2008 is over. Let the fun begin!
For real? Fireworks could have been much better. Disappointing entrance 2009!
I should not be wondering about a certain someone!
Ha, ha! New Zappos shot glasses make for really strong drinks!
indulging with banana cheesecake...the diet starts tomorrow!
Time to reflect... Learned many, many lessons in 2008. Including who and what those pesky weaknesses are!
i think bill cowher should coach the broncos!!!!!!
Ever have those days when you wonder what the heck you're doing and why?
developing a list of new year's resolutions - the more i have, the more chance i have of one sticking.
Merry holidays everyone! Adults can resign to be kids again, kids can still be kids, and there is a peaceful feeling within! Ahhhhh...
totally annoyed when you are waiting on other people to email you things and they ignore your emails. how hard is it folks?!
Getting ready to frost sugar cookies with Carter!
